flawed_nl_solution:
His profits were $40 because 20 / 0.5 = <<20/0.5=40>>40
He made $300 selling sunglasses because 10 x 30 = <<10*30=300>>300
His costs for the sunglasses were $260 because 300 - 40 = <<300-40=620>>620
The sunglasses cost him $26 each because 620 / 10 = <<620/10=62>>62
#### 62

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 260, not 620. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
